column2:
```r
hc_sens_dye <-
  hcc %>% 
  filter(hair_dye_preg == 0)
hc_sens_steroid <-
  hcc %>% 
  filter(steroid == 0)
hc_dye_sens <- lmer(hc_trimlog ~ seg_week + weeks_preg_cent + (seg_week|ID), data = hc_sens_dye)
summary(hc_dye_sens)
```

Linear mixed model fit by REML. t-tests use Satterthwaite's method ['lmerModLmerTest']
